TopicTitle: Kerbalism with just the science part

Articles.Content: So i was using Kerbalism and KSPIE in a new 1.6 game. But apperently Kerbalism breaks KSPIE, so i will need a new life support mod (i'm thinking TAC-LS, suggestions welcome). But I really like the way science is handled in Kerbalism. Is it possible to just add that part of the mod? (or make Kerbalism be friends with KSPIE, or any other mods suggestions that are similar to the Kerbalism science handling?).
you might want to ask on the Kerbalism forum thread rather than just in Add-On discussions"...you're more likely to get your question seen by people actually using / developing Kerbalism

Yup.  Also in the settings cfg just change to false for the things you don't want.

Peace
